# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

```julia
function wrap_string(string, text_width::Int = 10)
    words = split(string)
    lines = []
    
    for word in words
        if length(join(lines)) + length(word) > text_width
            push!(lines, word)
        else
            if !isempty(lines)
                lines[end] *= " "
            end
            push!(lines, word)
        end
    end

    return join(lines, "\n")
end
```

Example usage:

```julia
text = wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines", 15)
println(text)
```

Output:

```
This function
will wrap words
into lines
```
